  • Method Details

    • resolveIsland

      public void resolveIsland(Island islandToResolve)
      Resolves an island and possibly changes that island's owner. In case of tie between two or more players, the owner of the island is not changed
      Parameters:
      islandToResolve - the island to resolve

    • resolveIsland

      public void resolveIsland()
      Resolves the island where mother nature is and eventually changes that island's owner. In case of tie between two or more players, the owner of the island is not changed

    • canStealProfessor

      public boolean canStealProfessor(Color color, DiningRoom myDiningRoom, DiningRoom otherDiningRoom)
      Checks if the player who owns myDiningRoom can steal the professor from the player who owns otherDiningRoom
      Parameters:
      color - the Color to check
      myDiningRoom - the DiningRoom of the Player who wants to steal the Professor
      otherDiningRoom - the DiningRoom of the Player who owns the Professor
      Returns:
      true if the owner of myDiningRoom can steal the professor

    • getMNMaxSteps

      public int getMNMaxSteps()
      Returns the maximum number of steps that mother nature can do this turn
      Returns:
      the maximum number of steps that mother nature can do this turn

    • playCharacter

      public void playCharacter(Character character, Island island, Color color, List<Color> srcColors, List<Color> dstColors) throws InvalidCharacterException, CharacterAlreadyPlayedException, StudentNotOnTheCardException, InvalidActionException, InvalidStudentException, NotEnoughCoinsException
      Method to use the effect of a character and to check if one had already been used this turn
      Parameters:
      character - The character which we want to use the effect of
      srcColors - list of the color of the students of the source
      dstColors - list of the color of the students of the destination
      Throws:
      InvalidCharacterException - if the Character is not valid
      CharacterAlreadyPlayedException - if a Character has already been used
      StudentNotOnTheCardException
      InvalidActionException
      InvalidStudentException
      NotEnoughCoinsException

      Instances the correct strategy accordingly to the playedCharacter
      Parameters:
      playedCharacter - the Character which we want to set the correct strategy accordingly to

    • playPassiveCharacterWithColor

      public void playPassiveCharacterWithColor(Color color)
      Instances the InfluenceIgnoreColor strategy
      Parameters:
      color - the color which we want to ignore in the influence compute

    • moveStudent

      public void moveStudent(Color color, Place destination) throws InvalidActionException, InvalidStudentException
      Moves a Student of the selected Color to the selected Place
      Parameters:
      color - the Colo of the Student to move
      destination - the destination to move the Student to
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the action is not valid
      InvalidStudentException - if the Player does not own a Student of the selected Color

    • moveMotherNature

      public void moveMotherNature(int numSteps) throws InvalidActionException, InvalidStepsForMotherNatureException
      Moves MotherNature of the selected number of steps (numSteps)
      Parameters:
      numSteps - the number of steps which MotherNature should move of
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the action is not valid
      InvalidStepsForMotherNatureException - if the number of steps selected is greater than the allowed number of steps

    • chooseCloud

      public void chooseCloud(int cloudIndex) throws InvalidActionException, InvalidCloudException
      Chooses a cloud not yet chosen ad fills the selected Player Entrance with the students on it
      Parameters:
      cloudIndex - the index of the Cloud
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the action is not valid
      InvalidCloudException - if the Cloud is not valid
